Title: 🖼 For over ten months, Gaza has endured relentless bombardment b...
Description: For over ten months, Gaza has endured relentless bombardment by israel and the U.S., resulting in the deaths of at least 186,000 Palestinians and widespread devastation. At least 500 healthcare workers and 165 journalists have been killed in this U.S.- and israeli-led genocide, aimed both at preventing healthcare to Gazans and intimidating survivors into silence.🎥: Samir.foundation on Instagram(2/2)

Title: 🎬 🚨SAMIR FOUNDATION FUNDRAISER 🇵🇸 On New York City For Gaza �...
Description: 🚨SAMIR FOUNDATION FUNDRAISER🇵🇸 On New York City For Gaza🗓️ Labor Day September 2nd🕛 5-9 PM📍Exact location given to those who register🎟️ tinyurl.com/LDNYCRSVP🤲🏻 tinyurl.com/DONATESAMIR📱FOR UPDATES/INFO:Twitter/X: @wolpalestineTelegram: t.me/wolprotest📢🇵🇸 Mark your calendars and join us on September 2nd at the Samir Foundation fundraiser following the national march to support the rebuilding of Gaza’s healthcare system. The Samir Foundation has been actively training medical students in basic trauma life support, helping to save countless more lives. Their goals include rebuilding a medical school and rejuvenating the healthcare system in northern and southern Gaza.(1/2)

Title: 🖼 STARTING AT 12:00 PM EST‼️🇵🇸 https://shorturl.at/kMWGL Regis...
Description: STARTING AT 12:00 PM EST‼️🇵🇸https://shorturl.at/kMWGLRegister to attend this online conversation with Palestine Diaspora Movement featuring WOL chair Nerdeen Kiswani, titled -Resistance until Return: How the Diaspora Can Help the Homeland.-The primary purpose of this event is to unify the collective power of the Palestinian diaspora and leverage it to liberate our homeland. Our goals include re-educating ourselves on the core principles of Palestine (Al Thawabet), serving the homeland in its struggle for liberation, and emphasizing the central role of Islam in our struggle for self-autonomy.Your learning doesn't end here. The cause for Palestine is not a one-time event. You must continue education and turn it into concrete action. If you are committed to the movement, you are committed long-term. Join in half an hour for an enriching and empowering online event and experience. Together, we can educate and mobilize to serve our homeland.
